task.title: Deleting a system model
task.shortdesc: When you want to remove an existing system model to create a new system model, you can delete the existing system model.

taskbody.prereq: You must have ensured that a system model exists in the initial Team Space.

info.p: The System Model page is displayed.

step.cmd: Click the Open action menu icon in the right-pane.

info.p: The Delete System Model dialog box is displayed.

taskbody.result: You have deleted the system model from the Team Space repository.
